I thought, based on most reviews, that this would be a decent quality purse. I was wrong. It is poorly made. The top “kiss” type closure pops open with the least provocation. It arrived packed perfectly flat, like a book, which was surprising, because I was under the impression that this was a structured handbag - like a doctor’s bag. It does not have a hand strap as pictured in the product listing. Instead, it has a shoulder strap that can be shortened, but it looks cheap that way. I would be embarrassed to carry it. It is not fashionable or professional looking.

评论概述: This is the handbag I have always searched for!
评论详情: Most handbags are loaded inside with many little gaped-open or zippered pockets - which are difficult for me to manage! I prefer using the "Braille" method when rooting into my purse, instead of searching through all those  pockets! This purse is very attractive, vintage in design, and artistically well-crafted.  The main selling point for me is that it's also a roomy, HOLLOW container with enough space for me to drop in my wallet, cell phone, makeup bag, and more. I love the "kiss lock" which makes it a cinch to open up and shut down the purse. I have now bought two - brown and green, and may even go for the black and red in future! The low price is truly amazing!
I love the style and size of this purse for every day use. It exceeded my expectations.

I love satchel purses and especially with the 'kiss lock' and optional shoulder strap. I'm always changing out my purses and refuse to pay hundreds of dollars for the real deal. This purse looks like real leather (no, it doesn't feel or smell real), and accessorizes nicely with dressier clothing. The purse is roomy on the inside with a zippered side pouch and two open pouches on the opposite side of the bag. The inside lining is soft, the closure is solid/strong, and the small amount of decoration (faux metal scrollwork) looks nice. Overall, I'm quite pleased with this purse.
Love this purse. So vintage looking.
